sentences.en: A perpetual malaria reigns in this region.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区,经常流行疟疾.

sentences.en: Do you believe in perpetual love in this secular world?
sentences.cn: 在这个世俗的世界你还相信有天长地久的爱情 吗 ?

sentences.en: He carried his concentrated burden and his perpetual suspense.
sentences.cn: 他独自负荷着沉重的负担,长期怀着惴惴不安的心情.

sentences.en: He is on a perpetual search for truth.
He was irritated by their perpetual complaints.
sentences.cn: 他们一再发牢骚把他惹火了.

sentences.en: I ejaculated mentally , " you deserve perpetual isolation from your species for your churlish inhospitality.
sentences.cn: ”我心里直叫, “ 只为你这样无礼待客,就该一辈子跟人群隔离.

sentences.en: Large numbers exist in perpetual poverty.
sentences.cn: 大量的人长期生活在贫困之中.

sentences.en: Outdoors, mosquitoes and midges were a perpetual torment.
sentences.cn: 在户外，蚊子和蠓虫永远让人不得安生。

sentences.en: Perpetual motion is one of the important physical concepts.
sentences.cn: 永久运动是重要物理概念之一.
那只狗是经常惹人讨厌的东西.

sentences.en: The forgiveness of sins is perpetual and righteousness first is not required.
sentences.cn: 宽恕罪过是永恒的,并不计较原来是否是好人.

sentences.en: The land was subjected to perpetual warfare.
sentences.cn: 在这块土地上,战争连绵不断.

sentences.en: Though I tried to be orderly, I lived in perpetual confusion.
sentences.cn: 我虽然力求整洁, 但永远生活在混乱之中.
